data.eml:eml: Tingidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) from Laos: new species and new records

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guilbert, Eric (2007): Tingidae (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) from Laos: new species and new records. Zootaxa 1442: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.176026
